definition: to melt down/to remelt (metals)/fig. to acquire new education/to bake again
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Many of the gold ornaments are melted down to be made into coins.
sentences.chinese: 很多黃金飾物回爐後鑄成了金幣。

sentences.english: Remove from heat, then stir in flour, gradually pour in milk and cook until thickened.
sentences.chinese: 離火拌入麪粉，徐徐倒入鮮奶，回爐煮至濃稠。

sentences.english: The system is intended for smoke removal. Any obtained metal particles will go back to the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 該系統用於排煙，任何獲得的金屬微粒都將回爐。

sentences.english: Many of the gold ornaments are melt down to be made into coin.
sentences.chinese: 很多黃金飾物回爐後鑄成了金幣。

sentences.english: The company has the strength of recycled waste.
sentences.chinese: 本公司擁有廢料回爐實力。
